1.name: The Exorcist
1.description: When a 12 year-old girl is possessed by a mysterious entity, her mother seeks the help of two priests to save her.

2.name: Mean Streets
2.description: A small-time hood aspires to work his way up the ranks of a local mob.

3.name: American Graffiti
3.description: A couple of high school grads spend one final night cruising the strip with their buddies before they go off to college.

4.name: La montaña sagrada
4.description: In a corrupt, greed-fueled world, a powerful alchemist leads a Christ-like character and seven materialistic figures to the Holy Mountain, where they hope to achieve enlightenment.

5.name: Robin Hood
5.description: The story of the legendary outlaw is portrayed with the characters as humanoid animals.

6.name: The Sting
6.description: Two grifters team up to pull off the ultimate con.

7.name: The Wicker Man
7.description: A puritan Police Sergeant is sent to a Scottish island village in search of a missing girl who the townsfolk claim never existed; stranger still are the pagan rites that take place there.

8.name: Papillon
8.description: A man befriends a fellow criminal as the two of them begin serving their sentence on a dreadful prison island, which inspires the man to plot his escape.

9.name: Live and Let Die
9.description: James Bond is sent to stop a diabolically brilliant heroin magnate armed with a complex organisation and a reliable psychic tarot card reader.

10.name: Serpico
10.description: An honest New York cop named Frank Serpico blows the whistle on rampant corruption in the force only to have his comrades turn against him.

11.name: Soylent Green
11.description: In the world ravaged by the greenhouse effect and overpopulation, an NYPD detective investigates the murder of a big company CEO.

12.name: Enter the Dragon
12.description: A martial artist agrees to spy on a reclusive crime lord using his invitation to a tournament there as cover.

13.name: Paper Moon
13.description: During the Great Depression, a con man finds himself saddled with a young girl who may or may not be his daughter, and the two forge an unlikely partnership.

14.name: Westworld
14.description: A robot malfunction creates havoc and terror for unsuspecting vacationers at a futuristic, adult-themed amusement park.

15.name: Don't Look Now
15.description: A married couple grieving the recent death of their young daughter are in Venice when they encounter two elderly sisters, one of whom is psychic and brings a warning from beyond.

16.name: Badlands
16.description: An impressionable teenage girl from a dead-end town and her older greaser boyfriend embark on a killing spree in the South Dakota badlands.

17.name: Summer Wishes, Winter Dreams
17.description: Rita, a middle aged New York City homemaker, finds herself in an emotional crisis which forces her to re-examine her life, as well as her relationships with her mother, her eye doctor ...                See full summary »

18.name: Amarcord
18.description: A series of comedic and nostalgic vignettes set in a 1930s Italian coastal town.

19.name: High Plains Drifter
19.description: A gunfighting stranger (Clint Eastwood) comes to the small settlement of Lago and is hired to bring the townsfolk together in an attempt to hold off three outlaws who are on their way.

20.name: Contes immoraux
20.description: An erotic collection of short stories, an anthology comprised of tantalizing tales about sexual desire and its diverse manifestations.

21.name: The Way We Were
21.description: Two disparate people have a wonderful romance, but their political views and convictions drive them apart.

22.name: Magnum Force
22.description: San Francisco Inspector "Dirty" Harry Callahan (Clint Eastwood) is on the trail of vigilante Police Officers who are not above going beyond the law to kill the city's undesirables.

23.name: The Long Goodbye
23.description: Private investigator Philip Marlowe helps a friend out of a jam then gets implicated in his wife's murder.

24.name: La planète sauvage
24.description: On a faraway planet where blue giants rule, oppressed humanoids rebel against their machine-like leaders.

25.name: The Day of the Jackal
25.description: A professional assassin codenamed "Jackal" plots to kill Charles de Gaulle, the President of France.

26.name: Charlotte's Web
26.description: A gentle and wise grey spider with a flair for promotion pledges to save a young pig from slaughter for dinner food.

27.name: Il mio nome è Nessuno
27.description: A young, easygoing gunman (Hill) worships and competes with an old gunfighter (Fonda) who only wants to retire.

28.name: Jesus Christ Superstar
28.description: Film version of the musical stage play, presenting the last few weeks of Christ's life told in an anachronistic manner.

29.name: Coffy
29.description: A sexy black nurse takes vigilante justice against inner-city drug dealers after her sister becomes their latest victim.

30.name: The Three Musketeers
30.description: A young swordsman comes to Paris and faces villains, romance, adventure and intrigue with three Musketeer friends.

31.name: The Last Detail
31.description: Two Navy men are ordered to bring a young offender to prison, but decide to show him one last good time along the way.

32.name: Scalawag
32.description: A peg legged pirate is searching for treasure with the help of a young boy, teen girl and a parrot. They'll have to fight Natives and his former crew on the way.

33.name: White Lightning
33.description: An ex con teams up with federal agents to help them with breaking up a moonshine ring.

34.name: Kanashimi no beradonna
34.description: An evil feudal lord rapes a village girl on her wedding night and proceeds to ruin her and her husband's lives. After she's eventually banished from her village, the girl makes a pact with the devil to gain magical ability and take revenge.

35.name: Walking Tall
35.description: Based on the life of Tennessee sheriff Buford Pusser whom almost single-handily cleaned up his small town of crime and corruption, but at a personal cost of his family life and nearly his own life.

36.name: Scarecrow
36.description: Max, an ex-con drifter with a penchant for brawling is amused by Lion, a homeless ex-sailor, and they partner up as they head east together.

37.name: Cahill U.S. Marshal
37.description: A tough Marshal has a difficult task when his two sons join a gang and rob a bank.

38.name: La nuit américaine
38.description: A committed film director struggles to complete his movie while coping with a myriad of crises, personal and professional, among the cast and crew.

39.name: Pat Garrett & Billy the Kid
39.description: Pat Garrett is hired as a lawman on behalf of a group of wealthy New Mexico cattle barons to bring down his old friend Billy the Kid.

40.name: The Golden Voyage of Sinbad
40.description: Sinbad and the vizier of Marabia, followed by evil magician Koura, seek the three golden tablets that can gain them access to the ancient temple of the Oracle of All Knowledge.

41.name: La grande bouffe
41.description: A group of men go to a villa in the French countryside where they resolve to eat themselves to death.

42.name: Turks fruit
42.description: A young love faces with old problems.

43.name: Lost Horizon
43.description: While escaping war-torn China, a group of Europeans crash in the Himalayas, where they are rescued and taken to the mysterious Valley of the Blue Moon, Shangri-La.

44.name: Scream Blacula Scream
44.description: The vampire Mamuwalde (Blacula) is stirred by African voodoo, and is forced to kill again.

45.name: Thriller - en grym film
45.description: A young woman, muted after a sexual assault as a child, is trained to seek violent revenge on those who have wronged her after being kidnapped and forced to work as a prostitute.

46.name: Charley Varrick
46.description: A man, his wife, and their friend, stage a bloody bank robbery, unaware they are stealing money from the Mob.

47.name: The Last of Sheila
47.description: A year after Sheila is killed in a hit-and-run, her multi-millionaire husband invites a group of friends to spend a week on his yacht playing a scavenger hunt-style mystery game. The game turns out to be all too real and all too deadly.

48.name: Breezy
48.description: A young girl tries to find her way in life, suffering from her own naivety and sincerity.

49.name: The Iceman Cometh
49.description: A salesman with a sudden passion for reform has an idea to sell to his barfly buddies: throw away your pipe dreams. The drunkards, living in a flophouse above a saloon, resent the idea.

50.name: The Candy Snatchers
50.description: A mute boy stumbles upon a teenage girl kidnapped and buried alive by three young psychopathic criminals who want to extort diamonds from her rich stepfather, but can he help her?
